text: Leonid Bujor (27 November 1955 – 6 January 2021) was a Moldovan politician. He served as the nation's Minister of Education from 2009 to 2011. In December 2010, he was awarded with the Order of Honour by acting President Mihai Ghimpu. Bujor was born in Singureni, Rîșcani. On 6 January 2021, during the COVID-19 pandemic in Moldova, Bujor died of COVID-19. He was 65. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moldova Category:Moldovan politicians
title: Leonid Bujor
